location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 19 to William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], from Edward Galley at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Some text is missing from the top of page 97.

mods.abstract: The letter notes that Bussora's [Basra's] express boat sprung a leak and needed to be taken shore (to Bushire) for repair and thus Messrs Robinson and Crawford will travel to Bussora via dow rather than on Bussora's boat. The letter also details other administrative matters related to letters sent and received.
